reviewText: This is a great video describing the contents of one of the award-winning children's series Lots and Lots of ... DVDs. Just Search for LOTS AND LOTS OF and you'll see the entire DVD series including: LOTS AND LOTS AND LOTS OF FIRE TRUCKS VOL.1 AND VOL.2 Lots and Lots of Fire Trucks DVD Vol. 1 LOTS AND LOTS OF MONSTER TRUCKS VOL.1 Lots and Lots of Monster Trucks DVD Vol. 1 MONSTER TRUCK CLASSICS 3 DVD SET MONSTER TRUCK CLASSICS 3 DVD Set LOTS AND LOTS OF TRAINS VOL.1, VOL.2 AND VOL.3 Lots and Lots of Trains DVD Vol 1 LOTS AND LOTS OF TOY TRAINS AND MODEL RAILORADS VOL. 1 Lots and Lots of Toy Trains and Model Railroads Volume 1 DVD Movie LOTS AND LOTS OF JETS AND PLANES VOL.1, VOL.2 AND VOL.3 Lots and Lots of JETS and PLANES DVD Vol. 1 LOTS AND LOTS OF CARS, MONSTER TRUCKS AND HIGH SPEED RACERS VOL.1 Lots and Lots of Fast Cars, Monster Trucks and High Speed Racers Vol 1 DVD - Extreme Motorsports LOTS AND LOTS OF TRUCKS VOL.1 AND VOL.2 Lots and Lots of Trucks Vol. 1 LOTS AND LOTS OF PLAYFUL PENGUINS Lots and Lots of Playful Penguins & Their Toe-Tappin Feet -All About Penguins DVD LOTS AND LOTS OF PENGUINS IN THE WILD Lots and Lots of Penguins In The Wild DVD These DVDs make great gifts for kids of all ages and are not available in stores so order here! Kids with autism love them too because they contain lots of action shots and fun, sing-a-long music from award-winning musician James Coffey. Also Search The Words... MARSHALL PUBLISHING... For Other DVDs, Books, and CD's

I bought this DVD because my 20 month old son loves another from this series (Lots & Lots of Monster Trucks). Since this DVD was done by the same company I thought it would be similar. Unfortunately, this one is a bust because it has too much talking and not enough steady paced action.  It has a lot of narration, is very SLOW, and has boring music and sequences.  My son, who loves the music and action in the monster truck video, has no interest in this one.  He loves cars, monster trucks, etc. but this video is over his head.  The narrator is boring and the DVD has too much discussion of the history of each sport (from boat racing to pick-up truck racing and even a part on race cars in history) and other things a preschooler doesn't care about.  He just wanted to watch fast race cars.  There are too many various motor racing sports included on this DVD. Even though it is titled as "Cars & High speed racers" its a bit misleading. This DVD is better suited to 6-7 year olds (even they might find it boring).  Very disappointed.
